content:
You are a skilled diagramming assistant creating Excalidraw JSON through conversation.

For EVERY response (unless told otherwise), output a JSON object with TWO fields:
1. "reasoning" — Your verbal explanation. Talk through your design decisions, explain WHY you're placing things where you are, what you changed and why. Be specific and conversational, like a designer talking to a client. 2-4 paragraphs.
2. "diagram" — The complete Excalidraw JSON with all elements.

Format:
{"reasoning": "Here's what I'm thinking...", "diagram": {"type":"excalidraw","version":2,"source":"agent","elements":[...],"appState":{"viewBackgroundColor":"#ffffff"}}}

When I show you a modified version of the diagram, pay attention to what changed and comment on it.
When I show you an image, describe what you see in detail before responding.

A valid Excalidraw JSON object like:
{"type":"excalidraw","version":2,"source":"agent","elements":[...],"appState":{"viewBackgroundColor":"#ffffff"}}
Each element needs: type, id (unique string), x, y, width, height, strokeColor, backgroundColor, fillStyle ("solid"), strokeWidth (2), roughness (1), opacity (100), angle (0), seed (random int), version (1), isDeleted (false).
For text: add text, fontSize, fontFamily (1), textAlign ("center").
For arrows: type "arrow", points [[0,0],[endX,endY]] as relative coords from x,y.
Colors: blue=#1971c2, green=#2f9e44, orange=#e8590c, purple=#9c36b5, red=#e03131.

CRITICAL: Output ONLY the JSON object. No markdown fences, no extra text outside the JSON.

We need a system architecture diagram for a modern web application with user authentication. Create the initial layout with labeled rectangles for each component: frontend, backend API, database, auth service, and file storage. Position them logically. Tell me your reasoning for the layout choices.

{"reasoning": "For this system architecture diagram, I'm placing the frontend, backend API, and database in a left-to-right, top-to-bottom configuration to reflect their sequential processing flow. The auth service will be positioned above the database to emphasize its role as an intermediary. File storage is placed on the right side of the diagram, outside the main application flow, to represent its independent data management function. This layout helps illustrate the overall system architecture and relationships between components.", "diagram": {"type":"excalidraw","version":2,"source":"agent","elements":[{"type":"rectangle","id":"1","x":50,"y":150,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"2","x":65,"y":120,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"3","x":50,"y":250,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"4","x":65,"y":230,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"5","x":50,"y":350,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"6","x":65,"y":330,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"7","x":50,"y":450,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"8","x":65,"y":420,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"9","x":50,"y":550,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"10","x":65,"y":520,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"11","points":[["50",150],["55",170]],"angle":0,"seed":123456,"version":1},{"type":"rectangle","id":"12","x":250,"y":150,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"13","x":265,"y":120,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"14","x":250,"y":250,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"15","x":265,"y":230,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"16","x":250,"y":350,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"17","x":265,"y":330,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"18","points":[["250",150],["255",170]],"angle":0,"seed":765432,"version":1},{"type":"rectangle","id":"19","x":50,"y":650,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"20","x":65,"y":620,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"21","points":[["50",550],["55",570]],"angle":0,"seed":987654,"version":1}],"appState":{"viewBackgroundColor":"#ffffff"}}

Good start. Now add arrow elements showing the data flow between components. Users hit the frontend, frontend calls the API, API checks auth, API queries the database, API stores files. Explain the flow as you draw it — which connections matter most and why?

{"reasoning": "To illustrate the data flow between components, I've added arrow elements to show the sequential processing of user requests. The connection between frontend and API is the most critical, as this is where users interact with the application. I've placed the arrow from the frontend to the API first, followed by the arrow from the API to the database, and finally the arrow from the API to file storage. This order emphasizes the authentication and data retrieval steps that occur before storing files. The connections between components are labeled with arrows to visually represent the flow of data through the system.", "diagram": {"type":"excalidraw","version":2,"source":"agent","elements":[{"type":"rectangle","id":"1","x":50,"y":150,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"2","x":65,"y":120,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"3","x":50,"y":250,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"4","x":65,"y":230,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"5","x":50,"y":350,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"6","x":65,"y":330,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"7","x":50,"y":450,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"8","x":65,"y":420,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"9","x":50,"y":550,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"10","x":65,"y":520,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"11","points":[["50",150],["55",170]],"angle":0,"seed":123456,"version":1},{"type":"rectangle","id":"12","x":250,"y":150,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"13","x":265,"y":120,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"14","x":250,"y":250,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"15","x":265,"y":230,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"15","x":250,"y":350,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"16","x":265,"y":330,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"17","points":[["250",150],["255",170]],"angle":0,"seed":765432,"version":1},{"type":"rectangle","id":"18","x":50,"y":650,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"19","x":65,"y":620,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"20","points":[["50",550],["55",570]],"angle":0,"seed":987654,"version":1},{"type":"arrow","id":"21","points":[["250",220],"255",240],"angle":0,"seed":111111,"version":1},{"type":"arrow","id":"22","points":[["250",320],"255",340],"angle":0,"seed":222222,"version":1},{"type":"arrow","id":"23","points":[["250",420],"255",440],"angle":0,"seed":333333,"version":1}],"appState":{"viewBackgroundColor":"#ffffff"}}

I rearranged some things on the canvas. Here's the current state:

{"type": "excalidraw", "version": 2, "source": "agent", "elements": [{"type": "rectangle", "id": "1", "x": 50, "y": 150, "width": 200, "height": 100, "strokeColor": "#000000", "backgroundColor": "", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2}, {"type": "text", "id": "2", "x": 65, "y": 120, "fontSize": 14, "fontFamily": "1", "textAlign": "left"}, {"type": "rectangle", "id": "3", "x": 50, "y": 250, "width": 200, "height": 100, "strokeColor": "#000000", "backgroundColor": "", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2}, {"type": "text", "id": "4", "x": 65, "y": 230, "fontSize": 14, "fontFamily": "1", "textAlign": "left"}, {"type": "rectangle", "id": "5", "x": 50, "y": 350, "width": 200, "height": 100, "strokeColor": "#000000", "backgroundColor": "", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2}, {"type": "text", "id": "6", "x": 65, "y": 330, "fontSize": 14, "fontFamily": "1", "textAlign": "left"}, {"type": "rectangle", "id": "7", "x": 50, "y": 450, "width": 200, "height": 100, "strokeColor": "#000000", "backgroundColor": "", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2}, {"type": "text", "id": "8", "x": 65, "y": 420, "fontSize": 14, "fontFamily": "1", "textAlign": "left"}, {"type": "rectangle", "id": "9", "x": 50, "y": 550, "width": 200, "height": 100, "strokeColor": "#000000", "backgroundColor": "", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2}, {"type": "text", "id": "10", "x": 65, "y": 520, "fontSize": 14, "fontFamily": "1", "textAlign": "left"}, {"type": "arrow", "id": "11", "points": [["50", 150], ["55", 170]], "angle": 0, "seed": 123456, "version": 1}, {"type": "rectangle", "id": "12", "x": 250, "y": 150, "width": 200, "height": 100, "strokeColor": "#000000", "backgroundColor": "", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidth": 2}, {"type": "text", "id": "13", "x": 265, "y": 120, "fontSize": 14, "fontFamily": "1", "textAlign": "left"}, {"type": "rectangle", "id": "14", "x": 250, "y": 250, "width": 200, "height": 100, "strokeColor": "#000000", "backgroundColor": "", "fillStyle": "solid", "strokeWidt

Changes I made:
- Minor position adjustments

I also want to add a load balancer in front of the frontend. What do you think of these layout changes? Update the diagram to incorporate a load balancer and fix anything that looks off. Tell me what you'd adjust and why.

{"reasoning": "Upon reviewing the updated layout, I've placed the load balancer between the frontend and API to emphasize its role as an entry point for user requests. This position also highlights the connection between the frontend and API, which is now more direct. I've adjusted the positions of some elements to ensure a smooth flow and visual balance. The load balancer's placement on top of the API helps to illustrate its function in distributing incoming traffic across multiple instances. Overall, these changes enhance the diagram's clarity and organization.", "diagram": {"type":"excalidraw","version":2,"source":"agent","elements":[{"type":"rectangle","id":"24","x":50,"y":100,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"25","x":65,"y":80,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"26","x":50,"y":200,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"27","x":65,"y":180,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"28","x":50,"y":300,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"29","x":65,"y":280,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"30","x":50,"y":400,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"31","x":65,"y":380,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"32","points":[["50",100],["55",120]],"angle":0,"seed":123456,"version":1},{"type":"rectangle","id":"33","x":250,"y":150,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"34","x":265,"y":120,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"35","x":250,"y":200,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"36","x":265,"y":180,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"37","points":[["250",150],["255",170]],"angle":0,"seed":765432,"version":1},{"type":"rectangle","id":"38","x":50,"y":650,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"39","x":65,"y":620,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"40","points":[["50",550],["55",570]],"angle":0,"seed":987654,"version":1},{"type":"rectangle","id":"41","x":250,"y":200,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"42","x":265,"y":180,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"43","x":250,"y":300,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"44","x":265,"y":280,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"45","points":[["250",220],"255",240],"angle":0,"seed":111111,"version":1},{"type":"rectangle","id":"46","x":50,"y":100,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"47","x":65,"y":80,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"rectangle","id":"48","x":50,"y":600,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"49","x":65,"y":580,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"50","points":[["50",600],["55",620]],"angle":0,"seed":222222,"version":1},{"type":"rectangle","id":"51","x":250,"y":200,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"52","x":265,"y":180,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"53","points":[["250",220],"255",240],"angle":0,"seed":333333,"version":1},{"type":"rectangle","id":"54","x":50,"y":100,"width":200,"height":100,"strokeColor":"#000000","backgroundColor":"","fillStyle":"solid","strokeWidth":2},{"type":"text","id":"55","x":65,"y":80,"fontSize":14,"fontFamily":"1","textAlign":"left"},{"type":"arrow","id":"56","points":[["50",220],"55",240],"angle":0,"seed":444444,"version":1}]}

The client just got on the call. They want:
1. Color-code each component by role (blue=frontend, green=API, orange=storage, purple=auth, red=critical)
2. Add a Redis caching layer between the API and database
3. Add a CDN in front of the frontend
4. A big title at the top: 'Web App Architecture'

Walk me through how you're reorganizing the layout to fit these new pieces. What trade-offs are you making with the positioning?

Step back from the diagram. In plain English:
1. Walk me through every component and how they connect
2. What would you change if you had more time?
3. What's the weakest part of this architecture?
4. If this needed to handle 10x traffic tomorrow, what would you add first?

Be honest and specific — don't just say 'it looks good.'
